==Japanese==

===Kanji===
{{ja-kanji|grade=6|rs=糸03}}

# the color [[crimson]], a [[vivid]] [[red]] edging towards [[pink]]

====Readings====
{{ja-readings
|goon=[[ぐ]] (gu)
|kanon=[[こう]] (kō)
|kanyoon=[[く]] (ku)
|kun=[[くれない]] (kurenai), [[べに]] (beni), [[あか]] (aka), [[あかい|あか.い]] (aka.i), [[もみ]] (momi)
|nanori=[[くれ]] (kure), [[もみ]] (momi)
}}

[[File:Solid kurenai.svg|thumb|119px|{{lang|ja|紅}} (''kurenai'', ''beni''): hexadecimal color code #D71345]]
[[File:Safflower.jpg|thumb|119px|{{lang|ja|紅}} (''kurenai'', ''beni''): the [[safflower]], ''Carthamus tinctorius'']]

===Etymology 1===
Originally a compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=くれない|呉|tr1=Kure|t1=China|の|tr2=no|t2=possessive particle|藍}} (''ai'', “[[indigo]]”: by extension, “[[dye]]”). The {{m|ja|紅花|tr=benibana}} plant (the [[safflower]]), from which the ''kurenai'' color dye was extracted, was brought to Japan from China.

{{IPAchar|/kure no ai/}} → {{IPAchar|/kurenai/}}

====Pronunciation====
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|Kun'yomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[kɯᵝɺ̠e̞na̠i]}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|くれない|hhira=くれなゐ}}

# the color [[crimson]], a [[vivid]] [[red]] edging towards [[pink]]
# the {{l|ja|sc=Latn|紅花|''benibana''}} or [[safflower]] from which this color is [[extract]]ed, ''[[Carthamus tinctorius]]''

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|color}} {{ja-r|紅色|くれない.いろ}}, {{ja-r|紅色|べに.いろ}}
* {{sense|plant}} {{ja-r|紅花|べにばな}}

[[File:DiorLippenstift.jpg|thumb|119px|{{lang|ja|紅}} (''beni''): [[lipstick]]]]
[[File:2006_Mac_Limited_Edition_Patternmaker_POWDER_BLUSH.jpg|thumb|119px|{{lang|ja|紅}} (''beni''): [[rouge]]]]

===Etymology 2===
Derivation unclear. Few native Japanese words begin with [[voiced]] [[plosive]]s, suggesting that this term was borrowed. May be from {{etyl|ryu|ja|sort=へに'}} ''bin'' as in {{m|ja|紅型|tr=bingata|pos=a type of brightly colored Okinawan dying technique}}, though that derivation is also unclear.

====Pronunciation====
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|Kun'yomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[be̞ni]}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|べに}}

# the color [[crimson]], a [[vivid]] [[red]] edging towards [[pink]]
# the {{l|ja|sc=Latn|紅花|''benibana''}} or [[safflower]] from which this color is [[extract]]ed, ''[[Carthamus tinctorius]]''
# the crimson [[pigment]] extracted from the ''benibana'', used in [[cosmetic]]s and as a [[food coloring]]
# [[rouge]], a red [[cosmetic]] traditionally made from the ''benibana''
# [[lipstick]] or [[lip liner]], also traditionally made from the ''benibana''

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|color}} {{ja-r|紅色|くれない.いろ}}, {{ja-r|紅色|べに.いろ}}
* {{sense|plant}} {{ja-r|紅花|べにばな}}
* {{sense|pigment}} {{ja-r|臙脂|えんじ}}: often slightly darker than ''beni''
* {{sense|rouge}} {{ja-r|頬紅|ほおべに}}
* {{sense|lipstick}} {{ja-r|口紅|くちべに}}

[[File:Red.svg|thumb|119px|{{lang|ja|紅}} (''aka''): hexadecimal color code #FF0000]]
